title: FW Test & Lab Engineer
summary: The Wireless Connectivity Silicon team is looking for wireless FW test & Lab engineer to help ensure the quality of the innovative wireless silicon for application in Apple’s products! We are also looking for this person with the right abilities and experience to lead day-to-day activities in wireless test labs!
description: Collaborate with FW, Radio, MAC, and Systems engineering teams to develop a FW test plan to ensure the stability, reliability, function correctness, and performance of Apple’s wireless silicon FW and products. Work on test plan development, manual and automatic test setup/scripts, publish test reports, collect test logs, first screen of test failure/debug...
key_qualifications: 5+ years proven experience as a firmware test engineer. 5+ years of hands-on experience in wireless verification including setting up and driving wireless hardware testing in an automated environment. Experience with the development and execution of automated test and continuous integration frameworks...
education_experience: BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience.
